item.description: Find out what is stopping you from getting what you want!! Weekly ongoing group on Wednesday Evenings for people who feel they are not getting what they want in life. In this group you will have the opportunity to look at how you are going about your life and discover new ways of being and operating in the world that will help you obtain the type of life you are looking for. A free initial individual meeting is required before you start attending. Group members commit to coming regularly. For more information go to my web site at www.glennbigonet.com and click on the link for the weekly group or call me at 617-462-6642. Glenn Bigonet, M.A. Compassionate Acceptance Counseling for Individuals, Couples and Families
item.name: Create the Life You've Always Wanted!!! - An Ongoing Weekly Group
